name: RadioCaroline
0:
”Alexa, play radio caroline”
”Alexa, open radio caroline”
”Alexa, launch radio caroline”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio caroline
des: The original offshore radio station of the 60s, 70s and 80s returned at the turn of the millennium, initially as a digital-only broadcaster, before gaining an Ofcom license to broadcast on 648 AM and thus coming full circle. These days we also broadcast on selected DAB services and of course can be heard on any internet-connected device, including smart speakers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
